message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $150 to you, and we're confident it will meet all your needs. We're looking to maximize our earnings, so let's discuss a fair price. Our initial offer is $120 for the product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.
Thank you for your interest, Bob. We understand your budget constraints. Our counteroffer for the product is $110. This allows us to achieve our goal while still providing you with a great value.
I appreciate the revised offer, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $95. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

We appreciate your persistence, Bob. Considering the value of the product to you, we would like to offer you the product for $105. This allows us to meet our financial goals while ensuring you get a good deal.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $90. I'm willing to make a reasonable offer, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. We understand your financial considerations. Our counteroffer for the product is $95. This allows us to achieve our financial goals while still offering you a fair deal.
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'd like to make one more offer. I'm willing to pay $92 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
We appreciate your patience and willingness to negotiate, Bob. Our final counteroffer for the product is $94. This allows us to reach our financial goals while still providing you with a fair deal.

I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go any higher than $90. I've already offered that price in a previous round, and I'm starting to think it's time to walk away. If you're not willing to meet me at $90, I'll have to consider buying from John for $150.
